participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: She is outgoing, expressive, and enjoys the finer things in life. Her high-maintenance nature makes her a bit demanding but also fun to be around.
participant_1.background: i love listening to britney spears. i'm high maintenance. i love spending money. i diet a lot.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: He is caring, practical, and has a great sense of humor. He often shares stories from his experiences in both parenting and his previous job.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. i've a son who is in junior high school. my father used to work for home depot. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
